oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Administration Building, 1887-03-19
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A neighbor's sketch of the Administration Building, then Holy Angels Academy, in 1887, March 19. This was just before the west wing addition began later that year.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Koessler Administrative Building with completed west wing, 1887-1888
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the Kessler Administrative Building with completed west wing from between 1887 and 1888. Note the new fence and old gas lamp at left.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: West Wing construction, 1907-07-02
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The West Wing of the 1887 building is broken into as the Prospect Avenue wing is built. This became known as the College Wing. Construction workers shown. Photo taken 1907-07-02.

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An architect's sketch is a focused picture of D'Youville College. Shows the proximity to Lake Erie, Niagara River, Peace Bridge, and Canada. Also shown is the Holy Angels Church, the Kavinoky Theater, Mary Agnes Hall, the Administration Building, and Madonna Hall.
